name: TAG
headline: TAG is the First Digital Bank (Chime/Revolut/N26) for Pakistan
description: TAG is setting new standards and changing the way Pakistan banks by building a digital bank for the masses, with an aim to encompass the entire financial life of users, from basic banking such as bank account and Visa Debit card to employer payrolls, salary advances, savings, and neo-brokerage in future.

founders.name: Talal Ahmad Gondal, Founder
founders.description: Former VC from Berlin now trying my luck with entrepreneurship, Also an ex-Amazonian.

founders.name: Ahsan K. Khan, Founder
founders.description:
An ex-Investment Banker, who drove fund raising and building/scaling product  from 0 to 1. 

Founder TAG/Fintech, Financial Services

founders.name: Alexander Lukianchuk, Founder
founders.description: a technical leader with over a decade of experience building products and services for the financial industry ‚Äî investment banking, trading, payments, neobanks

### Betting for All Tastes

  * Virtual Sports Betting ‚Äî sports simulations for those who appreciate the continuous rhythm of the game. Virtual matches are available 24/7.


Each format adds its own dynamics and tension, giving you the opportunity to feel part of the game.
### Poker for Connoisseurs

  * Texas Hold'em ‚Äî a classic for those who know how to manage their cards.

In our experience, these games open up new dimensions of excitement, adding depth and a unique competitive element.

### How to Withdraw Funds
To collect your winnings from B9 Gaming, you only need to take a few steps:
  1. Go to your profile. Go to the ‚ÄòWithdraw‚Äô tab.
  2. Specify the withdrawal method. If it is not already in your account, add it.
  3. Enter the amount. Make sure it meets the limits.
  4. Confirm the transaction and wait for the transaction to complete.

Based in Islamabad, TAG has assembled a team of 36 dedicated employees. This relatively small but dynamic team is looking to maximize impact in a burgeoning market that demands innovation.

TAG‚Äôs offerings are diverse, targeting essential banking needs and looking to expand into advanced financial services. Here‚Äôs what they‚Äôre currently tackling:
- Basic banking services, including a bank account and a Visa Debit card.
- Employer payrolls and salary advances.
- Future aspirations include savings accounts and neo-brokerage services, broadening the financial landscape for users.

**Conclusion**
There‚Äôs a palpable excitement around what TAG is building. By integrating a range of banking services into a single platform, they‚Äôre not just lowering the barrier to banking for many in Pakistan; they‚Äôre setting a new standard in financial technology.
